```
* Usage:
*   Pass the PID of the udevd netlink socket (listed in /proc/net/netlink,
*   usually is the udevd PID minus 1) as argv[1].
*   The exploit will execute /tmp/run as root so throw whatever payload you
*   want in there.
```
